scenario_text.value: Professor, you’re sure this is the way?
Yes. I’m reasonably sure.
Reasonably?

In this world, it’s difficult to say anything
for certain.

It’s possible the library could vanish just
as suddenly as it appeared.
Yeebus... Give me a break!

This is the right direction, isn’t it?
Then less talking, more moving!
Yeah!
Hrrrm?! Oh dear...
Did you find the library?!

No... But I’m afraid we’ve found a different
sort of danger.
Or it found us, to be precise.

Took you long enough. Pretty cold of you,
considering your friend’s in trouble.
Renamon!

(Renamon...is glaring at the professor in
anger?)
Wha’, what gives? I don’t like this...

Don’t worry, Miu. I’ve got you, no matter
which way this goes.
And don’t forget about me!
(Miu looks frightened.)

(And it’s not just her... Kaito is on edge,
and Minoru shrunk back a bit himself.)

What big eyes you have, my dear... Hey, you
ain’t gonna gobble up our professor, are you?

(What’s up with that look? Why is Renamon so
angry with the professor?)

Did you come all this way to see us?
Or for the library? ...For Miyuki?

Silence... You have no right to speak that
name!
It seems you bear animosity towards me...?

I have no obligation to answer that.
You will all become the Master’s sacrifices.

Sacrifices?! So the maiden’s not enough,
then?

Archnemon said it before. Human children
aren’t as valuable as the maiden, but...

They’re good for something! Still, we won’t
let you have your way!

I dunno what you’re planning, but you ain’t
getting any sacrifices from us, no way!

Hmph... The smallest wretches always snarl
the loudest.
How dare you!

What is this, Renamon?! Didn’t you want to
save Miyuki?!

We’re on the same side here! That’s why we
should—
Shut up!!!

If all of you hadn’t shown up in the first
place, this never would have happened!

This is all your fault! You should never have
come!
Grrrwlll...!
Are those...the Master’s Kenzoku?!
Did Renamon bring them here?!
No way!
This is as bad as it gets...
Renamon... Why are you doing this?!
